intent: User in activated seeking state - hungry for depth, ready to explore
scenario: Activated Seeking: User has done some inner work, ready for more depth

input.message: I've been in therapy for a while and done some shadow work. I'm starting to notice patterns in how I relate to authority figures and I'm curious what's underneath that. I feel ready to go deeper but I want to make sure I'm doing this in a grounded way.

notes.whyGold: Shows healthy activated seeking: User demonstrates self-awareness, grounding intention, pattern recognition. Ready for CORE processing with gentle symbolic edges.
notes.keyPattern: Matches user's readiness - not too shallow (FAST would under-serve), not too deep (DEEP would overwhelm)
notes.mythicMessaging: Honors the readiness while maintaining developmental pacing - invites deeper exploration with continued grounding
notes.architecturalSignificance: This is the sweet spot - avg=3.8, ascending, approaching Level 4. CORE processing with middleworld symbolic work.
